2_GREAT_FLOOD.selectionCondition: (LOCATION: OUTDOOR) AND (NOT ((SETTING: WILD_WEST) OR (SETTING: UTOPIAN_FUTURISTIC_CITY) OR (SETTING: DYSTOPIAN_FUTURISTIC_CITY) OR (SETTING: SPACE)))

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND (ACTOR1: ARROGANT) AND ((ACTOR1: ART_STATUS:>=3) OR (ACTOR1: COM_STATUS:>=3))
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: SUPPORTINGCHARACTER) AND (ACTOR1: AGE: OLD) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND (ACTOR1: SUPPORTINGCHARACTER) AND (ACTOR1: LEADER)

characterDefinitions.CINEMATOGRAPHER1: (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: CINEMATOGRAPHER) AND (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: MALE) AND (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: CINEMATOGRAPHER: SKILL: < 0.3) AND (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: UNDISCIPLINED)

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND ((ACTOR1: ART_STATUS: >=1) OR (ACTOR1: COM_STATUS:>=1)) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND (ACTOR1: SUPPORTINGCHARACTER_LOVE_INTEREST) AND (ACTOR1: UNDISCIPLINED)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND (ACTOR1: AGE: YOUNG) AND (ACTOR1: HAS_CHILD_AGED: 0_1)

characterDefinitions.DIRECTOR1: (DIRECTOR1: DIRECTOR) AND (DIRECTOR1: DIRECTOR: SKILL: < 0.3) AND (DIRECTOR1: MALE)

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST_KNIGHT) AND (ACTOR1: AGE: OLD) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)

characterDefinitions.ACTOR2: (ACTOR2: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR2: FEMALE) AND ((ACTOR2: SUPPORTINGCHARACTER_LOVE_INTEREST) OR (ACTOR2: SUPPORTINGCHARACTER_FEMME_FATALE))

82_LICE_ATTACK.selectionCondition: (LOCATION: JUNGLE: OUTDOOR) OR (LOCATION: DESERT: OUTDOOR) OR (LOCATION: FOREST: OUTDOOR)

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND (ACTOR1: MID) AND (ACTOR1: HOTHEADED) AND (ACTOR1: HAS_CHILD_AGED: 1_18 : MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND ((ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_EVIL_MONSTER) OR (ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_ANCIENT_EVIL) OR (ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_VAMPIRE) OR (ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_ALIEN))
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST) AND (ACTOR1: OLD) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)

characterDefinitions.DIRECTOR1: (DIRECTOR1: DIRECTOR) AND (DIRECTOR1: FEMALE) AND (DIRECTOR1: DIRECTOR: SKILL: < 0.3)

characterDefinitions.COMMON: ((ACTOR1: HARDWORKING) AND (ACTOR2: HARDWORKING)) OR ((ACTOR1: CHEERY) AND (ACTOR2: CHEERY))

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND (ACTOR1: OLD) AND (ACTOR1: HEARTBREAKER)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST) AND (ACTOR1: PLAYS_ENTITY_FROM_PREV_MOV) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST) AND (ACTOR1: PLAYS_ENTITY_FROM_PREV_MOV) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST) AND (ACTOR1: PLAYS_ENTITY_FROM_PREV_MOV) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND (ACTOR1: PLAYS_ENTITY_FROM_PREV_MOV) AND (ACTOR1: SUPPORTINGCHARACTER_LOVE_INTEREST: SAME)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST) AND (ACTOR1: PLAYS_ENTITY_FROM_PREV_MOV) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND (ACTOR1: PLAYS_ENTITY_FROM_PREV_MOV : DIFF_ACTOR)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: PERFECTIONIST) AND (ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_BANDIT) AND (ACTOR1: MALE)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND (ACTOR1: OLD) AND (ACTOR1: PROTAGONIST_WARRIOR)

characterDefinitions.DIRECTOR1: (DIRECTOR1: DIRECTOR) AND (DIRECTOR1: MALE) AND (DIRECTOR1: PERFECTIONIST) AND (NOT (DIRECTOR1: RACIST))

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND ((ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_SERIAL_KILLER) OR (ACTOR1: ANTAGONIST_MURDERER))

pre_08_SPECTACULAR_CHASES.selectionCondition: (SETTING: WILD_WEST) OR (SETTING: FAIRY_KINGDOM) OR (SETTING: ARTHURIAN_LEGENDS) OR (SETTING: MIDDLE_AGES) OR (SETTING: VICTORIAN_ENGLAND) OR (EVENTS: EVENTS_KNIGHT_TOURNAMENT) OR (EVENTS: EVENTS_STAGECOACH_ROBBERY)

characterDefinitions.CINEMATOGRAPHER1: (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: CINEMATOGRAPHER) AND (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: CINEMATOGRAPHER: SKILL: > 0.5) AND (CINEMATOGRAPHER1: MALE)

characterDefinitions.DIRECTOR1: (DIRECTOR1: DIRECTOR) AND ((DIRECTOR1: PERFECTIONIST) OR (DIRECTOR1: DEMANDING)) AND (DIRECTOR1: MALE)

characterDefinitions.ACTOR1: (ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND ((ACTOR1: COM_STATUS: >= 1) OR (ACTOR1: ART_STATUS: >= 1))
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND ((ACTOR1: COM_STATUS:>0) OR (ACTOR1: ART_STATUS:>0)) AND (ACTOR1: HEARTBREAKER)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: FEMALE) AND (ACTOR1: POLLUX_BEST_FEMALE_ROLE_WINNER) AND (ACTOR1: DEMANDING)
(ACTOR1: ACTOR) AND (ACTOR1: MALE) AND (ACTOR1: POLLUX_BEST_MALE_ROLE_NOMINEE) AND (ACTOR1: MELANCHOLIC)
